body: Advanced                              ${7:0} // Only enable for Advanced/Expert/higher missions (for achievements)
EventPopFile                          ${8:Halloween} // If you don't want this mission to be like wave 666 then delete this line
IsEndless                             ${9:0} // Activate super secret endless MvM mode (i dont know what this is)
Wave Schedule No WaveSpawns.description: Print a WaveSchedule Template with (mostly) everything you need to begin making a mission, but no WaveSpawns

Keyvalues Only Wave Schedule.description: Print a WaveSchedule Template with only the base keyvalues

Bases.description: Include the basic base files for robot templates

Sniper Mission.description: Prints a Sniper support bot Mission template

Spy Mission.description: Prints a Spy support bot Mission template

Sentry Buster Mission.description: Prints a Sentry Buster support bot Mission template

body: // Wave ${1:X} Teleporter Engis (Teleports into map (does not spawn at spawnbot) and tries to build sentry and tele)
// Wave ${1:X} Battle Teleporter Engis (Does not teleport into map (spawns at spawnbot) and tries to build sentry and tele)
Battle Engineer Mission.description: Prints a Battle Engineer Mission template

body: // Wave ${1:X} Sentry Engis (Teleport into map (does not spawn at spawnbot) and tries to build sentry, but will not build tele)
Sentry Only Engineer Mission.description: Prints a Sentry Only Engineer Mission template

body: // Wave ${1:X} Sentry Battle Engis (Does not teleport into map (spawns at spawnbot) and tries to build sentry, but will not build tele)
Sentry Only Battle Engineer Mission.description: Prints a Sentry Only Battle Engineer Mission template

body: WaitForAllDead "${7:waveXXy}" // You can only have either WFASpawned or WFADead
Support ${11:Limited} // This will make the robots appear in Support. 1 makes them spawn infinitely and Limited makes only TotalCount spawn. Delete this line to make them normal bots
Basic WaveSpawn template.description: Prints a basic wavespawn template for one-robot type subwaves

body: WaitForAllDead "${7:waveXXy}" // You can only have either WaitForAllSpawned or WaitForAllDead
Support ${11:Limited} // This will make the robots appear in Support. 1 makes them spawn infinitely and Limited makes only TotalCount spawn. Delete this line to make them normal bots
ShouldPreserveSquad ${13:1} // If the squad leader dies, should the rest stay as a squad
Squad WaveSpawn template.description: Prints a basic wavespawn template with Squad TFBots.

body: WaitForAllDead "${7:waveXXy}" // You can only have either WaitForAllSpawned or WaitForAllDead
Support ${11:Limited} // This will make the robots appear in Support. 1 makes them spawn infinitely and Limited makes only TotalCount spawn. Delete this line to make them normal bots
RandomChoice WaveSpawn Template.description: Prints a basic wavespawn template with random-choice TFBots.

body: WaitForAllDead "${4:waveXXy}" // You can only have either WaitForAllSpawned or WaitForAllDead
WaitBetweenSpawns ${6:15} // Only keep this if there will be more than one tank in this wavespawn
Tank WaveSpawn template.description: Prints a basic wavespawn template for a tank.
